text: monday i'm in, unless they catch me for a work dinner

I had a monday night ping pong at my house for 7 years. I had to give that up when my wife got pregnant becuase we were doing some remodeling to the house/garage. 7 years before that it was at someone else's house.  I haven't been super active in teh past two years, but we just got a ping pong table at the office. I'm nowhere a paid pro, and I've played mostly doubles, but I'm comfortable with an amateur title
I have a wicked serve, but thats about it
that can really make a game of singles <@U2H3TT8F2>
